Title: ILNumerics.Net
Description: ILNumerics.Net is a class library for .NET software developers. It greatly simplifies the implementation of all kinds of numerical algorithms. Generic, n-dimensional arrays, complex numbers, linear algebra, sorting, cells- and logical arrays as well as 2D and 3D plotting controls help developing perfomant algorithms on every platform supporting .NET.

Project Description
ILNumerics.Net is a class library for .NET software developers. It greatly simplifies the implementation of all kinds of numerical algorithms. Generic, n-dimensional arrays, complex numbers, linear algebra, sorting, cells- and logical arrays as well as 2D and 3D plotting controls help developing perfomant algorithms on every platform supporting .NET.
